topics.title: Describe Your Favorite Activity
topics.prompt: Talk about one activity you enjoy and why you like it.
topics.hint: 描述你最喜歡的活動，說明活動內容和你為什麼喜歡它，說 3 到 5 句。
topics.sample: I like playing basketball because it is fun and helps me stay healthy. I usually play with my friends after school. It makes me feel happy and active.

topics.title: Express Your Feelings About Nature
topics.prompt: Describe how you feel when you are outside in nature.
topics.hint: 說說當你在大自然中時的感受，可以包含看到的事物和你的心情，說 3 到 5 句。
topics.sample: When I am outside in nature, I feel calm and peaceful. I like to hear birds singing and see green trees. It makes me happy and relaxed.

topics.title: Talk About a Time You Felt Excited
topics.prompt: Share a story about a time you felt very excited and why.
topics.hint: 描述一個讓你感到刺激或興奮的經驗，說明發生了什麼和你的感受，3 到 5 句。
topics.sample: I felt very excited when I went on a roller coaster last year. The fast speed and big drops made my heart beat fast. It was scary but fun at the same time.

topics.title: Describe Your Dream Place to Visit
topics.prompt: Talk about a place you want to visit and what you want to do there.
topics.hint: 描述你想去的夢想旅遊地點，可以說旅遊活動和景色，說 3 到 5 句。
topics.sample: I want to visit Japan because I love its culture and food. I want to see cherry blossoms and try sushi. It will be an amazing trip.

topics.title: Share How You Show Happiness
topics.prompt: Explain how you show that you are happy in your daily life.
topics.hint: 說說你平常怎麼表達快樂，可以是表情、行為或特別的事情，3 到 5 句。
topics.sample: When I am happy, I smile a lot and laugh with my friends. Sometimes I dance or sing. Being happy makes me want to share joy with others.

topics.title: Describe a Person You Admire
topics.prompt: Talk about a person you admire and why you think they are special.
topics.hint: 描述一個你欽佩的人，可以是名人、家人或朋友，說明理由，說 3 到 5 句。
topics.sample: I admire my teacher because she is kind and patient. She helps me learn new things every day. Her positive attitude inspires me.

topics.title: Imagine You Can Do Anything
topics.prompt: Imagine you can do anything you want. What would you do and why?
topics.hint: 發揮想像力，說說如果你能做到任何事情，你會做什麼和原因，3 到 5 句。
topics.sample: If I can do anything, I would travel to space and see the stars close. It would be exciting to explore the universe. I want to learn more about planets.

topics.title: Describe How You Feel When With Friends
topics.prompt: Explain your feelings when you spend time with your friends.
topics.hint: 說說和朋友在一起時的感覺，可以包含做什麼和心情，說 3 到 5 句。
topics.sample: I feel happy and relaxed when I am with my friends. We like to play games and talk about our day. Being with friends makes me feel loved.

topics.title: Talk About Your Favorite Day
topics.prompt: Describe your favorite day and what makes it special.
topics.hint: 分享你最喜歡的一天，說明當天做了什麼和為什麼特別，3 到 5 句。
topics.sample: My favorite day is my birthday because I get to celebrate with family and friends. We have cake and play games. It feels joyful and fun.

topics.title: Explain Why You Love the World
topics.prompt: Tell why you love the world and what makes it beautiful to you.
topics.hint: 說說你為什麼愛這個世界，可以提到自然、人或文化，3 到 5 句。
topics.sample: I love the world because it is full of different people and cultures. The nature around us is beautiful, like mountains and oceans. It is a wonderful place to live.
